value.title: The Importance of Ethical AI: Mitigating Bias in Machine Learning Algorithms
value.excerpt: In a world increasingly reliant on artificial intelligence, ensuring ethics and fairness in AI systems is more vital than ever. Join us as we delve into the crucial topic of mitigating bias in machine learning algorithms and explore the importance of ethical AI in shaping a more equitable future for all.

value.title: Navigating The Risks Of AI Weaponization
value.excerpt: As AI continues to advance and become more pervasive, so do its risks. From mass disinformation campaigns and deepfakes to fully autonomous weapon systems, the convergence of AI, technology and “bad intentions” demands priority attention.

value.title: The Dark Side of Open Source AI Image Generators
value.excerpt: Open source tools allow anyone to make AI art. They have also been used to produce nonconsensual deepfake porn.

value.title: Artificial intelligence and design: Questions of ethics
value.excerpt: As machines behave in increasingly “human-like” ways, questions of ethics arise in relation to the design and use of AI technologies. Architect and academic Nicole Gardner explains why it’s vital for designers to understand the fundamental principles of AI systems.

value.title: Humane's Wearable AI Pin Hints At A Phone-Free Future
value.excerpt: Humane announced the AI Pin back in November of 2023, and it's currently available for pre-order in the US for $699 (as well as increasingly with a number of operator partners around the world). On top of this, there's a $24 monthly subscription fee to pay that covers connectivity, secure data storage and access to Humane's AI service.

value.title: Exposing The Brittleness Of Generative AI As Exemplified By The Recent Gibberish Meltdown Of ChatGPT
value.excerpt: Generative AI is brittle, though most people don't realize this crucial revelation. An example can be seen in the recent incident of a gibberish meltdown of ChatGPT.

value.title: As Google Retracts Gemini, Deepak Chopra Reflects On Morality In AI
value.excerpt: No algorithm is morally agnostic. The latest controversy over Google’s Gemini, reiterates that. A conversation with Deepak Chopra on morality, AI and consciousness.
